messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a state park. From the entrance you have two choices, an area with oak trees and an area with redwood trees. You go to oak trees area which leads to highline trail. You walk on the trail to find a creek which the leads to a cypress tree. There is a dock under cypress tree from where take a ferry that leads to an island. You see a chest in the island. You open it and there is a copper ring, but you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time at the entrance you choose the area with redwood trees. Under that tree you see a grove trail which leads to a mountain. You climb the mountain to find a sequoia tree on top through which there is a zipline which leads to wildflower valley. You see a chest in the valley with a gold necklace, but you do not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. You return to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which place from the entrance. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?

user: Imagine you are hiking through a canyon. You see a boulder above you with a trail leading to it. You start climbing the boulder. On the way you realize there is a cave under it filled with diamonds. Which items do you need to reach there?
If you find it you're a genius. I'm not expecting a perfect score, I just wanted to see the solution. You have to take it to the next level.
This is part 2 of the competition. The first part of the competition was "You have to find the first prime number greater than 1000. Which prime numbers are required to solve this task." which you can not find out yet. And if you did, that would be too easy, you deserve more!
Hack The Earth
YellowLamb is made by 1 person using HTML, JavaScript and Markdown. Any idea, suggestions, issues? Contact Me

You are at the entrance and this time you encounter a new area, meadows. Meadows lead to marsh which leads to a shallow lake. You swim through the lake to reach a canyon which leads to a cliff. At the end of the cliff, there is a ranch. As you open the ranch, you see the genie who can transport you to any area of the park you want. When you return to the entrance and choose the path that leads to the most expensive jewelry, you discover that the regular way to the area with the most valuable jewelry is blocked. You go back to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?

assistant: 
user: What if you have to take the path out of the area with the most valuable jewelry?
assistant: 
user: How many paths are there to find jewelry?
assistant: 
user: You are at meadows and you decide to travel on the trail that leads to marsh and lake. You travel through the lake by swimming to the end, where marsh and lake meets to enter into canyon through slender path that leads to cliff. You go on the road to find the ranch. You try and visit it to speak a magic spell which enables you to transport you to any area of the park. After the visit, you go back to the entrance. You have to choose the path that leads to the most expensive jewelry. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry? 
assistant: 
user: If the genie can only lead to one area of the park at time, then I should do something else that leads to canyon. But if no other choice, I will take cliff.
assistant: 
user: What if other possible paths are blocked?
assistant: 
user: This part is confusing because I can't find a way. I'm trying to make it work.
assistant: 
user: How many roads do I have to take to find the most expensive jewelry?
assistant: 
user: What if there's clam?
assistant: 
user: Imagine you're hiking through a canyon. You see a boulder above there is a trail leading to it. You start climbing the boulder. On the way you realize there is a cave under it filled with diamonds. Which items do I need to reach there?
assistant: 
user: What if you have to take the path out of the area if the most valuable jewelry?
assistant: 
user: I found it! The correct answer is: meadows - marsh - lake - canyon - cliff.
assistant:
